Package ch.iserver.ace.algorithm

Interface Summary
Algorithm This interface is the basic interface every OT algorithm implementation must implement.
ExclusionTransformation Interface for exclusion transformation functions.
InclusionTransformation Interface for inclusion transformation functions.
Operation This interface must be implemented by all operations.
Request This interface represents a request.
Timestamp This interface represents the concept of a timestamp.
TimestampFactory TimestampFactory is a factory that can create Timestamp objects from an external representation of timestamps in the form of an int array.
VectorTime Vector time is a concept used in almost all OT algorithms to determine causality relations of operations.
 

Class Summary
CaretUpdateMessage A CaretUpdateMessage is a message that carries a CaretUpdate as payload.
RequestImpl Default implementation of the Request interface.
 

Exception Summary
TransformationException Exception thrown by algorithm instances whenever transforming operations fails.
